mapper.update: update bim_grab.cinema_maoyan set maoyan_city_name = #{maoyanCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maoyan_area = #{maoyanArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, maoyan_city_name, maoyan_area, city_id, city_name, area_id, area_name, name, address from bim_grab.cinema_maoyan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
